Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: A whore openly commits vice with other men. She has no regard and respect for the morality or code of conduct as laid down in social and religious books.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: sMswr lok pRq`K hI vysvw pws jw ky Es nwl ibBcwr iBRStwcwr krdy hn Aru iqs nUM lokwˆ Aru bydwˆ dy igAwn Drm dI koeI kwn ljw Srm nhIˆ huMdI]

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: But if a lady of respectable family goes to another man tarnishes the image of her family.

lines.gurmukhi: kpt snyhI bg iDAwn Awn sr iPrY; mwnsr CwfY hMsu bMsu mY AigAwn hY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: An egret with false love in his heart wanders from one pond to the other. But if someone belonging to the family of swans (Sikh of the Guru) leaves the Mansarover lake like congregation of the True Guru, that ignorant person is a big fool.

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: An obedient Sikh of the True Guru engrosses his mind in the consecrated words of wisdom of the True Guru, keeps himself unsullied by the evils of other's wealth and other's body. But one separated from the True Guru and worshipper of gods and goddesses, r
